titles.title: Jesus! What A Friend For Sinners (J. Wilbur Chapman)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9 v10

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus! What a friend for sinners! Jesus, lover of my soul. Friends may fail me, foes assail me, He, my Savior, make me whole.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hallelujah! What a Savior! Hallelujah! What a Friend. Saving, helping, keeping, loving: You are with me ‘till the end.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, what a strength in weakness, Now I hide myself in Him. Tempted, tried, and often failing, He, my strength, my victory wins.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hallelujah! What a Savior! Hallelujah! What a Friend. Saving, helping, keeping, loving: You are with me ‘till the end.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, what a help in sorrows While the billows o’er me roll. Even as my heart is breaking He, my comfort, helps my soul.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hallelujah! What a Savior! Hallelujah! What a Friend. Saving, helping, keeping, loving: You are with me ‘till the end.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, what a guide and keeper While the tempest still is high. Storms about me, night o’er takes me, He, my Pilot, hears my cry.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hallelujah! What a Savior! Hallelujah! What a Friend. Saving, helping, keeping, loving: You are with me ‘till the end.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, I do now receive Him, More than all in Him I find. He has granted me His kingdom, I am His and He is mine. 10. Hallelujah! What a Savior! Hallelujah! What a Friend. Saving, helping, keeping, loving: You are with me ‘till the end.{/lang-eng}
